fr.upmc.datacenter.controller.interfaces

Interface ControllerManagementI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    fr.upmc.components.interfaces.ComponentImplementedI, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.OfferedI, java.rmi.Remote, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.RequiredI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Controller, ControllerManagementConnector, ControllerManagementInboundPort, ControllerManagementOutboundPort

    public interface ControllerManagementI
extends fr.upmc.components.interfaces.OfferedI, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.RequiredI
    The interface ControllerManagementI defines the methods to manage the Controller.

    Description

    Author:
    Cédric Ribeiro et Mokrane Kadri
